verses.verse: <S%H199>"However,<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> please <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to all my <S%H1697>words.<s%>
See <S%H6605>now,<s%> I have opened my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H2441>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H561>words<s%> shall utter the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart.<s%> That which my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1847>know<s%> they shall <S%H4448>speak<s%> <S%H1305>sincerely.<s%>
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5397>me,<s%> and the breath of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> gives me <S%H2421>life.<s%>
If you <S%H3201>can,<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H6186>me.<s%> Set your words in order <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3320>me,<s%> and stand forth.
<S%H410>Behold,<s%> I am toward God even as you <S%H6310>are.<s%> I am also <S%H7169>formed<s%> out of the <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
<S%H367>Behold,<s%> my terror shall not make you <S%H1204>afraid,<s%> neither shall my <S%H405>pressure<s%> be heavy on <S%H3513>you.<s%>
"Surely you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H4405>words,<s%> saying,
<S%H2134><s%> 'I am clean, without <S%H6588>disobedience.<s%> I am <S%H2643>innocent,<s%> neither is there iniquity in <S%H5771>me.<s%>
<S%H4672>Behold,<s%> he finds <S%H8569>occasions<s%> against <S%H2803>me.<s%> He counts me for his <S%H341>enemy.<s%>
He <S%H7760>puts<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks.<s%> He <S%H8104>marks<s%> all my <S%H734>paths.<s%>'
<S%H6030>"Behold,<s%> I will answer <S%H6663>you.<s%> In this you are not just, for <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H7235>greater<s%> than <S%H582>man.<s%>
Why do you <S%H7378>strive<s%> against <S%H6030>him,<s%> because he doesn't give account of any of his <S%H1697>matters?<s%>
For <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H259>once,<s%> yes <S%H8147>twice,<s%> though man pays no <S%H7789>attention.<s%>
In a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> in a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> when <S%H8639>deep<s%> sleep <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H582>men,<s%> in <S%H8572>slumbering<s%> on the <S%H4904>bed;<s%>
Then he <S%H1540>opens<s%> the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H2856>seals<s%> their <S%H4561>instruction,<s%>
That he may <S%H5493>withdraw<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>purpose,<s%> and <S%H3680>hide<s%> <S%H1466>pride<s%> from <S%H1397>man.<s%>
He keeps <S%H2820>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> and his <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H5674>perishing<s%> by the <S%H7973>sword.<s%>
He is <S%H3198>chastened<s%> also with <S%H4341>pain<s%> on his <S%H4904>bed,<s%> with <S%H7230>continual<s%> <S%H386>strife<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones;<s%>
So that his <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H2092>abhors<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8378>dainty<s%> <S%H3978>food.<s%>
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is so consumed <S%H3615>away,<s%> that it <S%H7210>can't<s%> be seen. His <S%H6106>bones<s%> that were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> stick <S%H8192>out.<s%>
<S%H5315>Yes,<s%> his soul draws <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> and his <S%H2416>life<s%> to the <S%H4191>destroyers.<s%>

"If <S%H3426>there<s%> is beside him an <S%H4397>angel,<s%> an <S%H3887>interpreter,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> among a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> to <S%H120>man<s%> what is right for <S%H3476>him;<s%>
then God is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and says, <S%H6308><s%> 'Deliver him from going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom.<s%>'
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall be <S%H7375>fresher<s%> than a <S%H5290>child<s%>'s. He <S%H7725>returns<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth.<s%>

He <S%H6279>prays<s%> to <S%H433>God,<s%> and he is <S%H7521>favorable<s%> to <S%H7200>him,<s%> so that he sees his <S%H6440>face<s%> with <S%H8643>joy.<s%> He <S%H7725>restores<s%> to <S%H582>man<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
He <S%H7789>sings<s%> before <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H2398><s%> 'I have sinned, and <S%H5753>perverted<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right,<s%> and it <S%H7737>didn't<s%> profit me.
He has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H5674>going<s%> into the <S%H7845>pit.<s%> My <S%H2416>life<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light.<s%>'
<S%H410>"Behold,<s%> God <S%H6466>works<s%> all these <S%H6471>things,<s%> twice, yes three times, with a <S%H1397>man,<s%>
to bring <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> that he may be <S%H215>enlightened<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
Mark <S%H7181>well,<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H2790>me.<s%> Hold your peace, and I will <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
If you <S%H3426>have<s%> anything to <S%H4405>say,<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H1696>me.<s%> Speak, for I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to justify <S%H6663>you.<s%>
If <S%H8085>not,<s%> listen to <S%H2790>me.<s%> Hold your peace, and I will <S%H502>teach<s%> you <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>"
